headline: Assessing Diamondback Energy’s Valuation As Recent Momentum Contrasts With Longer Term Returns
summary: Diamondback Energy today Diamondback Energy (FANG) has drawn fresh attention after recent trading moves, with the stock last closing at $159.12. Short term performance has been mixed, so it helps to step back and look at the recent return profile. See our latest analysis for Diamondback Energy. The recent 1-day share price return of 3.65% and 7-day share price return of 7.01% point to building short term momentum.
